name: webcams.travel
description: The World's Largest Landscape Webcam API ***** Get webcams by categories, country, region or just nearby your location ***** Get timelapse slideshows for every webcam ***** Get an uncluttered webcam layer for your map

api_methods.name: /webcams/list/bbox={ne_lat},{ne_lng},{sw_lat},{sw_lng}
api_methods.description: This is a modifier. Returns a list of the webcams in the bounding box given by north-east ({ne_lat},{ne_lng}) and south-west ({sw_lat},{sw_lng}) coordinates. Required: {ne_lat},{ne_lng},{sw_lat},{sw_lng}.

parameters.name: ne_lat
parameters.description: North-east WGS84 latitude of the bounding box.

parameters.name: sw_lng
parameters.description: South-west WGS84 longitude of the bounding box.

parameters.name: sw_lat
parameters.description: South-west WGS84 latitude of the bounding box.

parameters.name: ne_lng
parameters.description: North-east WGS84 longitude of the bounding box.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Localize the results to this language, if available. Default: "en".

parameters.name: show
parameters.description: Content to be listed in the response. Possible values are: "webcams", "categories", "continents", "countries", "regions", "properties". Default is "webcams".

utterances.utterance: Show me webcams in the area bounded by 40.7128° N, 74.0060° W to 34.0522° N, 118.2437° W.
List webcams within the bounding box from 51.5074° N, 0.1278° W to 48.8566° N, 2.3522° E.

Find webcams in the area between 55.7558° N, 37.6173° E and 52.5200° N, 13.4050° E.
Display webcams in the bounding box from 25.7617° N, 80.1918° W to 28.5383° N, 81.3792° W.
Show webcams in the region bounded by 22.3964° N, 114.1095° E to 13.7563° N, 100.5018° E.
